price: ইহঁতৰ পূৰ্বেও অস্বীকাৰ কৰিছিল নূহৰ সম্প্ৰদায়ে, আদ আৰু লৌহ শলাধাৰী ফিৰআউনেও,
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
